P.Cugaly 8/7/16 --- This timer / rung has been added to ensure that when the fluidising sequence requires the fluidising valve 4 open (A4.1.2VBW4) that it will at least be open for the duration of the pulse timer below.$NWhat was occuring is that during an IH fill the sequence to fluidise is kicked off starting at Valve 4 on for 5s, off for 10s, Valve 3 on for 5s, off for 10s ...... then valve 2 then valve 1. If the IH is still filling when Valve 1 has closed it goes back around to start at valve 4. Sometimes the IH fill stops, which stops the fluidising sequence, when valve 4 has only been opened for a very short time. For some reason in this situation we get the limit switch lost alarm (found to be losing the closed LSW.....). For whatever reason the closed limit switch seems to bounce resulting in this alarm. By adding the rung below a minimum opening time is introduced to try to stop this bounce..... lets see if it works......  (It seems to be a nuisance alarm and there should be no issue of having a minimum opening time for auto only).
